= Journal 2024-03-31 =

== Typst as a LaTeX Replacement ==
:typst:LaTeX:

- [[https://typst.app/docs/|Typst]]
- Pandoc supports conversion to and from `typst`.

== Hayagriva as a BibLaTeX Replacement ==
:hayagriva:biblatex:

- [[https://github.com/typst/hayagriva/blob/main/docs/file-format.md|The Hayagriva YAML File Format]]
  is less arcane than BibLaTeX.
- Zotero does not support.
- Imports but does not export BibLaTeX.
